data.name: TextPublisher
data.comment: Command text to view publishers

data.name: MenuItemSettings
data.comment: Command text to enter the settings view

data.name: InvalidOpCommandNotSupported
data.comment: Used for certain default commands that aren't supported in some VMs

data.name: MenuItemDeletePublisher
data.comment: Used on context menu to delete a publisher

data.name: MenuItemDeleteSubmission
data.comment: Used on context menu to delete a submission

data.name: MenuItemDeleteTitle
data.comment: Used on context menu to delete a title

data.name: InvalidOpCannotDeleteTitle
data.value: This title cannot be deleted. It is participating in {0} submissions.
data.comment: Used when a title cannot be deleted b/c it's involved in submissions

data.name: ConfirmationDeleteTitle
data.value: Getting ready to delete this title. This only deletes the entry in the database, not any associated documents (Word, PDF, etc.) Do you want to continue?
data.comment: Used to confirm title deletion

data.name: ConfirmationDeletePublisher
data.value: Getting ready to delete this publisher. Do you want to continue?
data.comment: Used to confirm publisher deletion

data.name: InvalidOpCannotDeletePublisher
data.value: This publisher cannot be deleted. It is participating in {0} submissions.
data.comment: Used when a publisher cannot be deleted b/c it's involved in submissions

data.name: ConfirmationDeleteAuthor
data.comment: Used to confirm author deletion

data.name: InvalidOpCannotDeleteAuthor
data.value: This author cannot be deleted. They are participating in {0} titles.
data.comment: Used when an author cannot be deleted b/c it's involved in titles

data.name: MenuItemAddAuthor
data.comment: Command text for add author

data.name: FormatStringFileNotFound
data.comment: Used when attempting to open a submssion document that doesn't exist

data.name: InvalidOpDocumentTypeNotSupported
data.value: This document type is obsolete and is no longer supported
data.comment: Used when attempting to view obsolete Outlook direct reference in submission documents

data.name: MenuItemCreateSubmission
data.comment: Command text for create a submission

data.name: MenuItemBrowseToPublisherUrlOrClick
data.value: Browse to this publisher's web site (or double click the row)

data.name: FormatStringCreateSubmission
data.comment: Used for confirmation when creating a submission

data.name: FormatStringCreateSubmissionOpen
data.value: {0}: You already have at least one submission to this publisher that has not yet received a response. Do you want to continue and create another submission?
data.comment: Used for confirmation when creating a submssion to a publisher with at leat one opne submission

data.name: ConfirmationDeleteTag
data.comment: Used to confirm tag deletion

data.name: InvalidOpCannotDeleteTag
data.value: This tag cannot be deleted. It is being used by {0} titles.
data.comment: Used when a tag cannot be deleted b/c it's being used

data.name: InvalidOpRenameAllCandidatesAlreadyRenamed
data.value: All of the version files for this title have already been renamed.

data.name: InvalidOpRenameFileDoesNotExistFormat
CaptionSelectTitleVersionAddByFile
data.value: Select a file to add to the versions of this title

data.name: ConfirmationRemoveTitleVersion
data.value: This operation will remove the selected version from this title. It does not delete the file on disk.

data.name: CaptionSelectTitleVersionReplaceByFile
data.value: Select a file to replace the file of the selected version

data.name: NotificationCannotExitTasksAreRunning
data.value: Cannot exit at this time. Background tasks are still running.

data.name: InvalidOpSubmissionDocumentFolderNotSet
data.value: The folder for submission documents hasn't been set or doesn't exist. Fix the configuration setting and try again.

data.name: InvalidOpNoDocumentId
data.value: Cannot open. There is no document associated with this entry.

data.name: ConfirmationTitlesCopiedToClipboard
data.value: The title list has been copied to the clipboard

data.name: ToolExportDetail
data.value: This operation exports all versions of each title to the specifed folder. Each file will be named in accordance with the date it was written, its title, language and version / revision. Only files that have changed or are not present in the export directory will be exported. Extra files in the export directory will be deleted.

data.name: ToolTitleMetadataDetail
data.value: This operation verfies that all files associated with title versions are present on disk and updates meta data that is stored in the database regarding each file, such as last updated date/time and word count.

data.name: InvalidOpOutputFolderNotSet
data.value: The folder for this operation hasn't been set or doesn't exist. Fix the configuration setting and try again.

data.name: FormatTextExport
MenuItemFilterToPublisher
data.value: Filter list to display only submissions to this publisher

data.name: TitleStatusPreviousToPublisher
data.value: Previously submitted to the same publisher

data.name: TooltipTitleCurrentSubmissionCount
data.value: Current submission count - the number of submissions that are still open for this title

data.name: TooltipTitlePublishedCount
data.value: Published count - the number of times this title has been published.

data.name: TooltipTitleSubmissionCount
data.value: Submission count - the total number of times this title has been submitted

data.name: TooltipTitleTagCount
data.value: Tag count - the number of tags assigned to this title

data.name: TooltipTitleUpdated
data.value: The updated date for the latest version of this title

data.name: TooltipTitleVersionCount
data.value: Version count - the number of versions that this title has

data.name: ConfirmationRemoveTitlePublished
data.value: This operation removes the record of publication for this title. You can add a new record back at any time.

data.name: WindowTitleSelectPublisherForPublished
data.value: Select a publisher for this published record

data.name: ToolTipPublisherAdded
data.value: The date this publisher was added to the database

data.name: TooltipPublisherLastSubmission
data.value: The date that the last submission was created for this publisher

data.name: ToolTipPublisherSubmissionCount
data.value: Submission count - the total number of times a submission has been made to this publisher

data.name: ConfirmationDeleteSubmissionDocument
data.value: Getting ready to delete this submission document. This only deletes the entry in the database, not the associated document. Do you want to continue?
data.comment: Used to confirm title deletion

data.name: MenuItemAddUserNote
data.comment: Command text for add user note

data.name: ConfirmationRemoveSubmissionPeriod
data.value: Remove this submission period for this publisher?

data.name: ToolTipPublisherSubmissionPeriodCount
data.value: Submission period count - the total number of submission periods that have been assigned to this publisher

data.name: ConfirmationDeleteSubmission
data.value: Getting ready to delete this submission. This will remove the submission record and all associated records such as submission documents and messages. It does not remove any documents from disk. Do you want to continue?

data.name: ToolOrphanDetail
data.value: This operation searches all files beneath the title root directory to find those files that are not associated with a title entry. The submission document folder and title export folder are automatically excluded from the search if they exist beneath title root. You can exclude other folders in configuration.

data.name: InvalidOpTitleRootFolderNotSet
data.value: The title root folder hasn't been set or doesn't exist. Fix the configuration setting and try again.

data.name: ConfirmationDeleteFile
data.value: This will delete the selected file from disk. Do you want to continue?

data.name: HeaderToolOperationSearch
data.value: This operation searches all files beneath the title root directory to find all files that contain the specified search term.

data.name: ConfirmationRemoveSubmissionMessage
data.value: Getting ready to remove this message. This does not delete any external files or resources, only the database entry. Do you want to continue?

data.name: InvalidOpMapiFolderNotSet
data.value: The Outlook folder from which to select submission messages hasn't been set. Fix the configuration and try again.

data.name: CaptionSelectMapiFolder
data.value: Select the folder to be used for submission messages

data.name: CaptionSelectSubmissionMessage
data.value: Select the message(s) to add to this submission

data.name: InvalidOpTitleListOutputFolder
data.value: The output folder for the title list operation does not exist.

data.name: ToolTitleListDetail
data.value: This operation creates a text file that has a list of all titles and their corresponding versions.

data.name: TooltipTitleWordCount
data.value: Word count - the number of words in the latest version of this title

data.name: MenuItemOpenItemOrDoubleClick
data.value: Open this item (or double click the row)

data.name: MenuItemOpenTitleOrDoubleClick
data.value: Open the latest version of this title (or double click the row)

data.name: MenuItemBrowseToPublisherUrl
data.value: Browse to this publisher's web site

data.name: HeaderToolOperationScramble
data.value: This operation enables you to scramble lines of text, and optionally the words within the lines. Paste text to begin.

data.name: InvalidOpNotEnoughTextToScramble
data.value: Not enough text to scramble. Paste some more text and try again.

data.name: HeaderToolOperationOrphanNotFoundFormat
data.value: Files (not associated with a title entry) - {0}

data.name: ConfirmationApplyExtractedTitleFormat
HeaderVersionProperties
data.value:
These properties are the same ones you can change from within Microsoft Word; they are saved within the document itself.
When you save properties here however, the document's file modification date is not set to the current date / time as it is when you make the changes from within Word. Instead, the modification date is incremented by 15 seconds from its original.

data.name: HeaderToolOperationConvert
data.value: This operation converts all .doc files in the specified folder to Open Xml (.docx ) files. If the converted file belongs to a title version, the version record will be updated to reflect the change. If a corresponding .docx file exists in the folder (for example, Report.doc and Report.docx), the .docx file will be overwritten. After the conversion, the .doc file will be deleted.

data.name: ConfirmationDeleteCredential
data.value: This operation will remove the selected credential and remove its association with any publishers that are using it. Do you want to continue?

data.name: CaptionSelectTitleFilterFolder
data.value: Select the folder to filter the title list by

data.name: InvalidOpDirectoryDoesNotExist
data.value: The specified directory does not exist

data.name: InvalidOpTitleDoesNotExist
data.value: The specified title record does not exist

data.name: InvalidOpRenameFilesMissing
data.value: One or more of the version files does not exist

data.name: ConfirmationAllVersionFilesRenamed
data.value: Success. All eligible version files renamed.

data.name: InstallationCaption
data.value: Select the directory that will hold the database files

data.name: MenuItemBrowseToUrlOrClick
data.value: Browse to this url (or double click the row)

data.name: CaptionIconsDesigned1
data.value: Icons designed by Linear Color SEO (Freepik), Smashicons, Swifticons, Maxim Basinski, and Eleonor Wang from Flaticon

data.name: ToolTipPublisherInPeriod
data.value: Publisher is currently in one of its submission periods

data.name: ConfirmationAddTitle
data.value:
This operation will add a new title record. If any title filters are in effect, they will be removed so that the new title displays in the list.
Do you want to continue?

data.name: ConfirmationAddPublisher
data.value:
This operation will add a new publisher record. If any publisher filters are in effect, they will be removed so that the new publisher displays in the list.
Do you want to continue?

data.name: ToolTipPublisherFilterFollowup
data.value: Filter publisher list to display only publishers that are active and flagged for follow up

data.name: ToolTipPublisherFilterInPeriod
data.value: Filter publisher list to display only publishers that are active and currently within a submission period

data.name: ToolTipPublisherFilterPaying
data.value: Filter publisher list to display only publishers that are active and are a paying market

data.name: ToolTipPublisherFilterActive
data.value: Filter publisher list to display only publishers that are active, i.e. not flagged as a goner

data.name: ConfirmationCreateTitleFromOrphan
data.value: This operation will create a title entry and use the selected file as the first version that is associated with the title. The written date for the title will be set to the last modified date of the file.

data.name: SettingsOrphanDirectoryExclusion
data.value: Orphan directory exclusions, separated by semi-colon

data.name: ToolTipPublisherExclusive
data.value: Publisher wants an exclusive submission, i.e. does not accept simultaneous

data.name: TitleStatusSubmittedToExclusive
data.value: Currently submitted to a publisher that does not accept simultaneous submissions

data.name: ToolTipPublisherHasActive
data.value: Publisher currently has at least one submission that is active

data.name: ToolTipPublisherFilterHaveSub
data.value: Filter publisher list to display only publishers that currently have an open submission

data.name: InvalidOpSubmissionMessageFolderNotSet
data.value: The folder for submission messages has not been set or doesn't exist. Fix the configuration setting and try again.

data.name: TooltipMessageError
data.value: An error occured parsing the message file.

data.name: TooltipMessageInUse
data.value: The message file is in use, i.e. it has been selected as an entry for a submission message

data.name: InvalidOpCannotDisplayMapi
data.value: The message contents can't be displayed here. This message is a direct reference to the item stored in the Outlook message store. Double click the row to open the message.

data.name: InvalidOpTextViewerNotSet
data.value: The external text viewer application has not been set. Fix the configuration setting and try again.

data.name: HeaderToolOperationMessageSync
data.value: This operation renames the files that are used for external submission messages to correspond to the date / time of the message and the message subject.

data.name: ConfirmationClearTitleFlags
data.value: This operation will clear the quick flag from all titles. Do you want to continue?

data.name: InvalidOpCannotAddVersionFile
data.value: This file has already been added to this title. Please choose a different file.
data.comment: Used when a file can't be added or replaced as a version file because it is already included

data.name: ConfirmationAddAuthor
data.value:
This operation will add a new author record. If any filters are in effect, they will be removed so that the new author displays in the list.
Do you want to continue?

data.name: TooltipScrambleBegin
data.value: Scramble the text in the text area

data.name: TooltipScramblePaste
data.value: Paste text from the clipboard into the text area to be scrambled

data.name: TooltipScrambleWord
data.value: When activated, words within the lines will be scrambled

data.name: TooltipSelfPublisherPublishedCount
data.value: Published count - total number of items published

data.name: MenuItemAddTitle
data.value: Add a title to the collection

data.name: ToolTipAuthorDefault
data.value: This is the default author when creating new titles

data.name: ToolSubmissionMetadataDetail
data.value: This operation verfies that all submission documents are present on disk and updates meta data that is stored in the database regarding each file, such as the last updated date/time.

data.name: ToolTipResetWindow
data.value: Reset this window to its default size

data.name: SettingsOrphanFileExclusion
data.value: Orphan file exclusions, separated by semi-colon

data.name: MenuItemCreateSubmissionToPublisher
data.value: Create a submission to this publisher
data.comment: Command text for create a submission

data.name: ToolTipSubmissionFilterActive
data.value: Submission is active (has not yet received a response)

data.name: ToolTipSubmissionFilterTryAgain
data.value: Submission received a try again response

data.name: MenuItemAddDocumentToSubmission
data.value: Add a document to this submission

data.name: TextCreateSubmissionDocument1
data.value: Getting ready to create a submission document. You may:

data.name: TextCreateSubmissionDocument2
data.value: Create a .docx document compatible with Microsoft Word and other word processors that support the Open XML specification.

data.name: TextCreateSubmissionDocument3
data.value: Create a placeholder entry in the submission documents. After, you can select an existing file to associate with this entry.

data.name: MenuItemAddSubmissionMessage
data.value: Add a message to this submission

data.name: TextNoPublisherPeriods
data.value: No submission periods defined for this publisher

data.name: ConfirmationAddSubmissionPeriod
data.value: This operation adds a submission period that runs from January 1 - December 31, i.e. all year. Once added, you can change the range of the submission period if needed.

data.name: ConfirmationResetSubmissionPeriod
data.value: This operation sets the submission period to January 1 - December 31, i.e. all year.

data.name: TitleStatusHeader
data.value: Please confirm that you want to submit the following titles

data.name: SettingsDatabaseLocationText
data.value:
Changing the database location will create a new database. No data will be copied. If you want to preserve your data, copy all files from the previous location to the new one.
Changes will take effect after you restart the application.

data.name: ConfirmationAddAlert
data.value: This operation will add a new alert record. If any filters are in effect, they will be removed so that the new alert displays in the list.

data.name: ToolTipSendReport
data.value: Send problem report. No personal information is included

data.name: MenuItemAddPublished
data.value: Add a published record to this title

data.name: MenuItemAddSelfPublished
data.value: Add a self published record to this title

data.name: ConfirmationClearPublishedDate
data.value: This operation clears the published date for this item. You can set the date again at any time.

data.name: MenuItemAddTitleVersion
data.value: Add an existing file as a version

data.name: ToolTipSynchonizeTitles
data.value: Synchronize file names to title and version

data.name: MenuItemReplaceTitleVersion
data.value: Replace the file for this version with another file

data.name: ToolTipCopyTitles
data.value: Copy the list of titles to the clipboard

data.name: ToolTipRefreshLinkVerify
data.value: Refresh the link list, adding new entries and removing any state entries

data.name: ConfirmationAddOrphanDirectoryExclusion
data.value: This operation excludes the directory of the selected file from further orphan search

data.name: ConfirmationAddOrphanFileExclusion
data.value: This operation excludes the selected file type from further orphan search

data.name: MenuItemCreateTitleFromEntry
data.value: Create a title entry from this file

data.name: MenuItemExcludeOrphanDirectory
data.value: Exclude this directory from orphan search
